Our aim is to be the most reliable service provider in our industry. That is why, after 10 years of service in the city of Calgary, and 15 years of experience in the industry, we continue to back up all of our work with a 2-year guarantee on labour and support all manufacturers' warranties on product. With Tile by Style, you can be confident that your project will be installed correctly and have the longevity you expect from tile.

Please call us if you have any questions or would like a free estimate for your next project.

profile:
I have completed over 17 years of work in all types of home renovations from small tasks (i.e. fixing sinks, or electrical plug malfunction) to full demo and completion of:  kitchen, bathroom, roofing, flooring, decks, garage (minus the cement pad) including electrical. finishing work inclusive of doors, windows including full trim.
I have totally demoed 2 houses and rebuilt from the studs up to and including all electrical, plumbing, and finishing to turn key ready.
In the last three years upon joining Homestars we have honed our craft and are specializing in bathrooms. We have won Best of award 2 years in a row now and have qualified for a third year which will put us in the Best of the Best of Award!!

profile:
At Western Bathrooms & Liners, we aren't special because we believe we are (though our moms sure think so,) - but we have experienced, tailored and progressed in the industry for over 26 years.

Western Bathrooms & Liners was the first company that started offering bathroom packages, which we announce weekly in local newspapers. Our services include complete bathroom renovations, such as flooring, heated tile flooring, vanity and countertops, granite, laminate, toilet installation, tub to shower conversions, tiling bathrooms, new plumbing, ensures and custom designed bathrooms and more . Western bathrooms offers Calgarians great value for their dollar. We are fully insured, bonded, have workman's compensation, and all of our employees and workers are fully trained and certified in their fields.

There is a different specialist for each aspect of your renovation, meaning the same person installing your tub and toilet will not be the same person as doing your tiling, or installing your glass for your shower or your granite counter top.

After completing over 26,000 bathroom renovations in Calgary, we are proud to stand by our great reputation and our quality work.

profile:
For every Home Maintenance need that may arise, Handyman Connection of Calgary is committed to providing you with dependable and skilled Handymen, great customer service, and first class workmanship. Just one call or click brings our expertise right to your door. Handyman Connection of Calgary can help turn your "to-do" list into "done."

Home repairs, renovations and remodeling are what we get excited about. Handyman Connection Calgary is your single solution for that list of home maintenance and home improvement that seems to grow longer every day. Whether you need something installed, built, fixed or maintained, we are your reliable and trusted partner for all your home repair, renovating and remodeling needs. Your home needs expertise and we have the experts at Handyman Connection of Calgary.
specialities:
Small to medium home repairs and renovations
•	Carpentry services
•	Tile & flooring*
•	Drywall install, patch or replace
•	Deck repair & building
•	Fence repair & building
•	General home maintenance
•	Painting and wall treatments
•	Home shelving & Storage
•	Plumbing services*
•	Electrical services*
•	Bathroom remodeling
•	Basement remodeling
•	Kitchen remodeling


*subcontracted to licensed trades

profile:
Project-Tek Inc. has over 30 years of experience in the renovation industry - What we do is not unusual, but how we do it is. Let our knowledge of remodeling and renovations, provide you with excellence in installation, design, and workmanship.

When we decided to bring in our 30+ years of industry experience into opening Project-Tek Inc. in 2013, we knew the kind of service and results we wanted to provide to our clients.

Our goal is to offer Calgary and surrounding area homeowners with budget-friendly bathroom remodeling and home renovations, with beautiful results they will love for a lifetime

You will notice the difference in how we do things right from the start. Our attention to detail shows with every project we undertake. We do not use pushy sales tactics and we take the time to educate our customers, so they can decide what is right for their home.

Project-Tek Inc. uses only quality products, and our in-house install provide flawless workmanship and allows us to maintain our remarkably high standards.

Premium results without the premium price. Even though we insist on the best for our customers, we still find ways to keep our prices competitive. This allows us to deliver value-driven service on all our projects.


Why choose us...

-Convenience... we come to you

-We provide you with a detailed and written estimate based on your needs and budget

-We guarantee you a job done right, the first time.

-We supervise all aspect of our services

-We have over three decades of experience in the renovation industry

-We are licensed, insured, and bonded

-We provide customer education on all aspect of our services

-We respect your environment and your home

-We love what we do...



​For a free in home consultation, please contact us at (403) 861-8324

profile:
IMAGINE - CREATE - ENJOY

As the premier custom home builder and luxury renovation experts of Calgary and Airdrie area, we put our 20+ years of experience to work for you. 

PRO Connect is your complete home development and renovation one-stop shop for all of your design, engineering, and construction needs. We are a team of skilled professionals providing construction, engineering, architectural, and design expertise. PRO Connect leverages over 200 years of professional team knowledge and experience in new construction, renovation, and engineering of both residential and commercial structures around Canada.

Our expansive knowledge in all aspects of project management, safety, and construction ensures that your project receives high-quality, innovative, and comprehensive solutions every step of the way to completion. We believe in providing every project, no matter the size, with exceptional work and focus on quality.
